titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretaries of the military departments to prescribe the conditions under which female members of the Armed Forces may be assigned to duty on ships that are engaged in combat missions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Star Print ordered on the bill.

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Deletes a Federal provision prohibiting the assignment of women to duty on vessels or in aircraft that are engaged in combat missions as well as their assignment to other than temporary duty on other Navy vessels.
